job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Build and enhance media mix models to connect the impact of marketing drivers and business short-term and long-term outcomes.</li><li>Develop optimization and simulation algorithms to guide the marketing investment and allocation recommendations to stakeholders.</li><li>Scale current Python modeling algorithm through parallel processing or other efficiency enhancement.</li><li>Design and execute A/B tests and other experiments.</li><li>Explain complex modeling approaches in simple terms and develop compelling narratives that connect modeling results with business problems.</li><li>Partner with cross-functional team to streamline data science solutions.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Minimum Qualifications</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Ph.D. degree in Statistics, Engineering, Operations Research, Computer Science, Economics, Mathematics, Physics, or related field.</li><li>Industry experience in building market mix and multi-touch attribution models.</li><li>8+ years of experience in MMM, measurement, A/B testing, marketing strategy &amp; analytics.</li><li>Experience with advertising, measurement, and/or digital marketing analytics.</li><li>Experience with advertising technology platforms Ad servers, DSPs, DMPs.</li><li>Proficient coding skills (Python/SQL) and database knowledge.</li><li>Extensive experience with predictive modeling algorithms.</li><li>Strong project management skills.</li><li>Communicate technical material to a range of audiences and to ‘tell a story that provides insight into the business.</li><li>You have a passion for working in a fast-paced agile environment.</li><li>A collaborative mindset and a sense of curiosity.</li></ul><p></p>
